rgba(0,0,0,.2)}.button.primary:active{background-color:#319ad2}.button.danger{background-color:#b43100;color:#fff;border:0}.button.danger:hover{background-color:#ce3800}.button.danger:active{background-color:#9b2a00}.button.special{background-color:#dc6f20;color:#fff;border:0}.button.special:hover{background-color:#e17d34}.button.special:active{background-color:#c6641d}
/*# sourceMappingURL=../maps/mini.css.map */

                    .list article .marker,aside.left{font-family:"Roboto Condensed",sans-serif}aside.left{font-weight:300;width:200px;float:left;padding-right:1em;position:relative;font-size:.8em;line-height:1.1em}aside.left h4,aside.left.small-facets{font-family:"Work Sans","Helvetica Neue",Arial,sans-serif}aside.left .selected,aside.left h4{font-weight:700}aside.left+section{border-left:1px solid    <div id="products-submenus">
                               <div id="prod-fictiune" class="prod-submenu">
                <h4><a class="no-style" href="/carti/fictiune/f">Ficțiune</a></h4>
                                <ul class="col3 right">
                                                            <li class="strong"><a href="/top/carti/fictiune/f">Top vânzări</a></li>

                <h4><a class="no-style" href="/carti/arta-arhitectura-si-design/a">Artă, arhitectură şi design</a></h4>
                                <ul class="col3 right">

                                <ul class="col1 left">
                                                        <li><a href="/carti/arta-arhitectura-si-design-albume-de-arta/ag">Albume de artă</a></li>
                                                                              <li><a href="/carti/arta-arhitectura-si-design-arhitectura/am">Arhitectură</a></li>

                                                                              <li><a href="/carti/arta-arhitectura-si-design-dans-si-artele-spectacolului/as">Dans şi artele spectacolului</a></li>

                                                      </ul>
            </div>
                                          <div id="prod-it" class="prod-submenu">

        <header>

			<article class="12u(large) 6u(xlarge) 4u(xxlarge)" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Book">
<figure>
	
        <a href="/test-driving-javascript-applications/p/umw,9781680501742"><img src="/images/e.png" data-src="https://i4.books-express.ro/$/9781680501742/test-driving-javascript-applications.jpg" alt="Test–Driving JavaScript Applications" data-size="182x225" class="list-cover" width="182" height="225"></a>
            
	</figure>

			<article class="12u(large) 6u(xlarge) 4u(xxlarge)" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Book">
<figure>
	
        <a href="/javascript-interview-questions-you-ll-most-likely-be-asked/p/umw,9781453870990"><img src="/images/e.png" data-src="https://i4.books-express.ro/$/9781453870990/javascript-interview-questions-you-ll-most-likely-be-asked.jpg" alt="JavaScript Interview Questions You'll Most Likely Be Asked" data-size="145x225" class="list-cover" width="145" height="225"></a>
            
	</figure>
        <header>
	<h2 style="overflow-wrap: break-word;" class="is-truncated"><a href="/javascript-interview-questions-you-ll-most-likely-be-asked/p/umw,9781453870990" title="JavaScript Interview Questions You'll Most Likely Be Asked"><span itemprop="name">JavaScript Interview Questions You'll Most Likely... </span></a></h2>

        <header>
	<h2 style="overflow-wrap: break-word;"><a href="/javascript-for-programmers/p/umw,9780137001316" title="JavaScript for Programmers"><span itemprop="name">JavaScript for Programmers</span></a></h2>
    
        <div class="narrow no-wrap">

    <script data-no-min="">
    function rc(id, name){
        var el = document.getElementById(id);
        el.className = el.className.replace(name, '');
    }
    function onloadCSS(e,n){function t(){!o&&n&&(o=!0,n.call(e))}var o;e.addEventListener&&e.addEventListener("load",t),e.attachEvent&&e.attachEvent("onload",t),"isApplicationInstalled"in navigator&&"onloadcssdefined"in e&&e.onloadcssdefined(t)}!function(e){"use strict";var n=function(n,t,o){function a(e){return l.body?e():void setTimeout(function(){a(e)})}function d(){r.addEventListener&&r.removeEventListener("load",d),r.media=o||"all"}var i,l=e.document,r=l.createElement("link");if(t)i=t;else{var s=(l.body||l.getElementsByTagName("head")[0]).childNodes;i=s[s.length-1]}var f=l.styleSheets;r.rel="stylesheet",r.href=n,r.media="only x",a(function(){i.parentNode.insertBefore(r,t?i:i.nextSibling)});var c=function(e){for(var n=r.href,t=f.length;t--;)if(f[t].href===n)return e();setTimeout(function(){c(e)})};return r.addEventListener&&r.addEventListener("load",d),r.onloadcssdefined=c,c(d),r};"undefined"!=typeof exports?exports.loadCSS=n:e.loadCSS=n}("undefined"!=typeof global?global:this);

    var addEventsListener=function(o,t,e){var n,i=t.split(" ");for(n in i)o.addEventListener(i[n],e)}
    !function(){function t(t){this.el=t;for(var n=t.className.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,"").split(/\s+/),i=0;i<n.length;i++)e.call(this,n[i])}function n(t,n,i){Object.defineProperty?Object.defineProperty(t,n,{get:i}):t.__defineGetter__(n,i)}if(!("undefined"==typeof window.Element||"classList"in document.documentElement)){var i=Array.prototype,e=i.push,s=i.splice,o=i.join;t.prototype={add:function(t){this.contains(t)||(e.call(this,t),this.el.className=this.toString())},contains:function(t){return-1!=this.el.className.indexOf(t)},item:function(t){return this[t]||null},remove:function(t){if(this.contains(t)){for(var n=0;n<this.length&&this[n]!=t;n++);s.call(this,n,1),this.el.className=this.toString()}},toString:function(){return o.call(this," ")},toggle:function(t){return this.contains(t)?this.remove(t):this.add(t),this.contains(t)}},window.DOMTokenList=t,n(Element.prototype,"classList",function(){return new t(this)})}}();

    var myNav = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();
    var ieVer = (myNav.indexOf('msie') != -1) ? parseInt(myNav.split('msie')[1]) : false;
    var App = window.App || {};
    App.is_logged = true;
    App.imgBase = "i0";
    function labInit(){

        loadCSS("/css/libs_1490280474.css");
        var ml = loadCSS("/css/main_1585401655.css");
        /*
        onloadCSS( ml, function() {
            document.getElementById("spinner").className += ' hidden';
            rc('main', 'ws');
        });
        */

        onloadCSS( ml, function() {
            var elems = document.getElementsByTagName('*'), i;
            for (i in elems) {
                if((' ' + elems[i].className + ' ').indexOf(' ws ')> -1) {
                    elems[i].className = elems[i].className.replace('ws', '');
                }
            }
        });

            $LAB
    .script(function(){
        if(ieVer !== false && ieVer <= 8){
            return '/js/html5shiv.js';
        }
    })
    .script('/js/skel.min.js').wait(function(){
    skel.breakpoints({
      xxlarge: '(max-width: 5000px)',
      xlarge: '(max-width: 1600px)',
      large: '(max-width: 1280px)',
      medium: '(max-width: 1024px)',
      small: '(max-width: 736px)',
      xsmall: '(max-width: 480px)'
    });
    rc('top-logo', 'ws');
    rc('header', 'ws');
    rc('submenu', 'ws');
    })
    .script(function(){
        if(ieVer !== false && ieVer < 9){
            return "/js/jquery-1.11.3.min.js";
        }else{
            return "/js/jquery-2.1.4.min.js";
        }
    }).wait()
    .script("/js/libs_1484923518.js").script("/polyglot.i18n.js").script("/js/main_1585304528.js").wait(function(){App.mainInit()}).script("/js/list_1493325241.js").script("/js/look-for-product_1471597624.js")}</script>
